1: <pb/><e>B'itz tu'n Asaf</e> <pb/><t>B'a'nte Dios kyuk'il aj Israel, kyuk'il qeju saq tuj kyanmi.</t>
2: <t>Ch'ixmi ẍin jaw tolje, ex ch'ixmi ẍex jilj qe nqane,</t>
3: <t>porke ma tzaj tlo'ch nk'u'je tej ẍe ok nke'yine puro tuj txub'txaj ate' qeju in jaw kyniman kyib' ex qeju mya nimal Dios.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Minti' in che k'ixb'isanjtz, b'a'n ta' kyximlal;</t>
5: <t>minti' in tzaj yajb'il kyi'j, ex minti' in tzaj jun k'ixk'oj kyi'j, ik tza'n kye txqantl xjal.</t>
6: <t>Aju kynimb'il kyib' tok kyu'n ik tza'n jun kyu', ex aju k'ixb'isab'l kyu'n kyi'j xjal tok kyu'n ik tza'n kyxb'alun;</t>
7: <t>nim mya b'a'n in tzaj jlet tuj kyanmi ex nim kyximb'etz mya b'a'n.</t>
8: <t>In che xmayin ex in che yolin mya b'a'n, in jaw kyniman kyib' ex in b'aj kyyolin ti'j tu'n kyk'ixb'iset xjal kyu'n;</t>
9: <t>in che yolin mya b'a'n ti'j Dios at tuj kya'j, ex kyaj tu'n kymandarin kyi'j kykyaqil xjal twitz tx'otx'.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Kyja'tzun in che ok lpe' xjal kyi'j ex jurat in xi kyniman xjal aju yol in tzaj kyma'n.</t>
11: <t>In kyma'n: ¿Baqa jaku tb'i Dios? ¿Baqa jaku tz'el tnik' Dios ti'j, aju Dios at tuj kya'j?</t>
12: <t>Kyja'tzun kyten qeju b'inchal mya b'a'n. Minti' in kyk'ulb'a'n jun mya b'a'n ex kukx in chmet kyq'inumab'l.</t>
13: <t>Noqx gan nno'k tilil wu'ne tu'n tten wanmiye saq ex minti' in tzaj ntzyu'ne jun ti'xti mya b'a'n.</t>
14: <t>Tuj enter q'ij in chin k'ixb'isanjtze tu'na, ex tkyaqil prim in kub' tq'o'na ncastiwoye.</t>
15: <pb/><t>Noqwit ma kub' nximane ik tza'n kye xjal lu, mawtlo che kub' nsb'u'ne qe tk'wa'la.</t>
16: <t>Ok tilil wu'ne tu'n tel nnik'e ti'j jlu, ex kyuw ela te weye.</t>
17: <t>Max el nnik'e ti'j alkye kb'ajel kyi'j tejxi wokxe tuj tja Dios.</t>
18: <t>Ma che kub' tq'o'na tuj jun b'e puro jilin ex in che'x tlamo'na tu'n kynaj.</t>
19: <t>Jurat naj in che naj tu'na, ex tu'nx kyxob'il in che kyim ex in che naj.</t>
20: <t>Ik kyten xjal lu ik tza'n jun witzik' ok tel qwatl, kyja'tzun Nman, ok tjaw we'ya, che elel tik'una ex mer ik tza'n noq jun tilb'ilal qe.</t>
21: <pb/><t>Tzaj nim tlo'ch nk'u'je ex tzaj jun ta'w tuj wanmiye</t>
22: <t>tu'nju minti' nnab'le ex minti' el nnik'e ti'j; mer ik qine twitza ik tza'n jun txkup.</t>
23: <t>Maske ikju, pero kukx ma chin tene tuk'ila ex tzyu'n qine tu'n tb'anq'ab'a.</t>
24: <t>Ẍaqlu'n qine tu'na ex tzaj tq'o'na nnab'le, te b'ajsb'il ok chin k'metela tu'na tuj tajwalila.</t>
25: <t>¿Alkye ẍaqlul weye at tuj kya'j? O'kx aya. Ex ok ntene tuk'ila minti'tl waje ti'j ju at twitz tx'otx'.</t>
26: <t>In b'aj tipun nximlale ex wanmiye, ex a Dios q'olte tipumal wanmiye ex ate wetzb'ile te jumajx.</t>
27: <pb/><t>Qeju nne'l kypa'n kyib' ti'ja che kymel; ex qeju in kyaj kykolin kyokslab'l ti'ja, che najel tu'na.</t>
28: <t>Atzun weye chin xel laq'e'ye ttxlaj Dios, ex atzun mas b'a'n te weye. Nman Dios, aya kolol weye ex kxel nchik'b'a'ne tkyaqil tb'inchb'ena.</t>
